scripts.test: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm test
scripts.test:ios-simulator: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm run test:ios-simulator
scripts.test:android: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm run test:android
scripts.test:android-emulator: cd test && npm install --silent --no-audit && npm run test:android-emulator
